root: ^You've brought everything! Thank you so much.
^Of course, here is your reward in Gold. It is well deserved.
^I would like you to also have my latest batch of medicine. You may need it when you're out there slaying Beasts.
^This medicine is strong and will heal you fully no matter your injuries. Please use it well, as it will take a while for me to make more.
^I will be busy crafting new supplies. In the meantime, if you're looking for more work, I suggest you go speak to the Merchant.
^Thank you again for your help. I will pray for you, Pilgrim.
